items.title: Q3 AGF smart contract deployment
items.description: Deployment of AGF smart contract pave the foundation for the Game Fund, allowing users to crowdfund and developers to grant.

items.title: Airdrops and ecosystem development
items.description: More opportunities to partnership and collaborate with other projects to initiate airdrops and bring other communities into ATM.

items.title: Third Feature
items.description: Launching the platform enticing more developers to join the ecosystem and enriching the gaming experience for community users.

items.title: WebApp redesign
items.description: New WebApp now equipped with a fresh interface and clear instructions on connecting to ATM.

items.title: Travel Agency collaboration
items.description: Collaboration with travel Agency to explore more real-world use case of LUCA, bringing the crypto to life.

items.title: AGF Game release
items.description: Launching the platform enticing more developers to join the ecosystem and enriching the gaming experience for community users.

items.title: iOS App live
items.description: "ATM connect" iOS App available on App Store unlocking exclusive experience in ATM ecosystem.

items.title: Q2 Upgrading website
items.description: New fresh look of ATM website upgrades the concept visualization, animated illustrations, and multi-language support boosting user experience when surfing in ATM.

items.title: Recovery plan complete
items.description: Recovery plan completed successfully, establishing foundation for future growth.

items.title: AVATAR AI launch
items.description: ATM connect iOS App available on App Store unlocking exclusive experience.

items.title: Third Feature
items.description: Launching the platform enticing more developers to join the ecosystem and enriching the gaming experience for community users.

items.title: Q4 TokenPR
items.description: Implementation of TokenPR system to enhance token distribution and rewards mechanism.

items.title: Complete the transition of all PR nodes becoming decentralised
items.description: Successfully transitioned all PR nodes to a fully decentralized infrastructure.

items.title: Smart contracts undergo audit
items.description: Comprehensive security audit of all smart contracts to ensure safety and reliability.

items.title: The concept was born
items.description: Initial conception and ideation of the ATM ecosystem and its core features.
